articles.title: WPK Conference to Be Convened
articles.content:
WPK Conference to Be Convened
						
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on June 23 released a decision on convening a conference of the WPK.
					 The decision says:
					
					All the Party members, servicepersons and people are now waging a dynamic general offensive full of conviction of certain victory and optimism to glorify this year marking the 65th anniversary of the WPK as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of the country with the great pride and self-confidence of holding General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the highest posts of the WPK and the revolution.
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il has steered the sacred Korean revolution to one victory after another in its annals for more than six decades, building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, on this land and ushering in a new era of prosperity. 
					
					 We are now faced with the sacred revolutionary tasks to develop the WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, into an eternal glorious party of Kim Il Sung and further increase its militant function and role to glorify the country as a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee decides to convene early in September, Juche 99 (2010) a conference of the WPK for electing its highest leading body reflecting the new requirements of the WPK and the developing revolution in which decisive changes are taking place in the efforts to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Djiboutian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Djiboutian President
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Ismail Omar Guelleh, president of Djibouti, on the occasion of the 33rd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Djibouti would grow stronger, wishing the president and the people of Djibouti greater success in the work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The riff-raffs of the "Grand National Party" of south Korea recently railroaded a "resolution critical of the north" over the "Cheonan" case through the "Defence Commission of the National Assembly" without going through voting procedures.
					 The resolution malignantly slandered the DPRK, talking about "provocation", "apology", "punishment" and "reparation". It also urged the authorities to take "tough countermeasures by both military and non-military means" and the international community to take more "resolute and effective countermeasures".
					
					 In this regard the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 958 on Saturday, which termed such action a blatant challenge to the desire of Koreans and the international community and an intolerable act of treachery carrying the sinister intention to opt for confrontation and take to the path of war to the last.
					
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 Not only south Koreans but the international community are getting increasingly skeptical about the "results of investigation" into the warship case announced by the puppet group, and the demand for reinvestigation is high on the agenda. Meanwhile, the discussion on the case at the UN is ending in smoke.
					
					 The recent railroading was nothing but a last-ditch effort of those upset by full exposure of the truth about the conspiratorial case.
					
					 The puppet group's persistent anti-DPRK racket under the pretext of the sinking case will escalate confrontation and the danger of war.
					
					 We will never tolerate the recent railroading of the "resolution". The puppet group will be held fully accountable for all the consequences to be entailed by its scheme to pass the "resolution" through the full-dress NA session that may create a catastrophic crisis on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Shandong Province
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Shandong Province
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Shandong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Shandong Provincial People's Government.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Friday by Wang Min, secretary-general of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC who is heading the Shandong provincial friendship delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift from Lao Youth Union Official
articles.content:
Gift from Lao Youth Union Official
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Khamphanh Sitthidampha, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Saturday by Alounxai Sounnalath, a delegate of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, who is participating in the second international preparatory meeting for the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students and the international solidarity events of youth and students for support to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Harvesting of First Crops Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Harvesting of First Crops Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The harvesting of wheat, barley and potato which were planted as the first crops of the double cropping began in the fields on co-op farms of the DPRK.
					 More than 50 percent of wheat and barley in the fields on cooperative farms of Haeju City and Thaethan and Paechon counties, South Hwanghae Province, have been harvested.
					
					 20 percent of wheat and barley and 14 percent of potato were harvested in all fields around Pyongyang.
					
					 Agricultural workers in North Hwanghae Province are harvesting first crops in hundreds of hectares of field everyday.
					
					 Cooperative farms in North and South Phyongan provinces and Kangwon Province and other areas are pushing forward the sowing of seeds for second crops in the fields where the harvesting was over, while speeding up the harvesting of first crops.

articles.title: "Among the People" Vol. 89 Published
articles.content:
"Among the People" Vol. 89 Published
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 89 of "Among the People", a collection of reminiscences.
					 The book contains 20 reminiscences telling about the great leadership ability and noble traits of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Reminiscences dealing with historical facts that Kim Il Sung together with Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, conducted a demonstration firing before the students of the Pyongyang Institute and visited Sinuiju of North Phyongan Province right after the liberation of Korea to unroll a blueprint to build a rich and powerful country.
					
					 Reminiscences such as "'The cooperative should be spruced up better than now'", "To supply people with more fruits," etc. tell about the wise leadership and benevolence of Kim Il Sung who always was on his field guidance.
					
					 The book also contains reminiscences that relate the story that Kim Il Sung gave instructions on doing all work including education, scientific research and art creation creatively to suit the specific situation and conditions of the DPRK.
					
					 It also contains reminiscences dealing with the fatherly love shown by the President for the people and the coming generation and his traits as a great man who worked hard for the development of agriculture in developing countries with his noble sense of international obligation and noble moral virtues.

articles.title: Korean War Termed Product of US Ambition for Domination
articles.content:
Korean War Termed Product of US Ambition for Domination
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The United States instigated the south Korean puppets to launch the Korean war of aggression in a bid to dominate the whole of the Korean Peninsula and reduce the Korean people into slaves. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The United States, well aware of the geopolitical importance of the Korean Peninsula as a strategic vantage for advance into the Asian Continent, stretched its tentacles of aggression to Korea from more than a hundred years ago, constantly giving its eye-teeth for it. 
					
					 It sent its aggression armed forces to south Korea as "liberators" under the pretext of "disarmament" of the Imperial Japanese Army in the wake of the conclusion of the Second World War in 1945. From the first day of their occupation of south Korea the U.S. imperialist warmongers subordinated south Korea as its complete political, economic and military colony by cooking up the pro-U.S. puppet government. They undisguisedly revealed their attempt to invade the DPRK while asserting that it is necessary to expand occupation to the whole of Korea. 
					
					 Such bellicose remarks as "Korea is a battlefield decisive of success or fail of the U.S. policy toward Asia" were publicly heard even from the U.S. political circles.
					
					 After its military occupation of south Korea, the U.S. pushed forward in real earnest the moves to provoke a war against the DPRK, pursuant to its DPRK policy for aggression. 
					
					 The United States finally ignited the war of aggression against the DPRK on June 25, 1950 based on careful preparations for it.
					
					 The United States and the south Korean conservative group are now getting frantic in the provocative moves while distorting the truth about the outbreak of the war with the lapse of six decades since its start as an occasion. But they are nothing but reckless actions precipitating their destruction. 
					
					 With nothing can the United States and the south Korean warmongers hide the truth of history nor escape from the responsibility for having launched the most destructive and brutal war, the article concludes.

articles.title: AINDF Issues Appeal to All Korean People
articles.content:
AINDF Issues Appeal to All Korean People
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Information Department of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) made public an "appeal to all the Korean people" on June 25, on the lapse of the 60 years since the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the DPRK by instigating traitor Syngman Rhee, according to Internet site Kuguk Jonson.
					 The appeal branded the June 25 Korean War as a brigandish war of aggression and an unprecedented war of massacre of  Koreans launched by the U.S. imperialists with the wild ambition to occupy the whole Korean Peninsula and put the world under their domination.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, which drove the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse by leading traitor Lee Myung Bak by the nose, are getting frantic in the moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK regarding the present time as a golden chance for launching the second June 25 war, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their stooges cooked up the case of "Cheonan's" sinking and are bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war against the DPRK while staging war exercises on the ground and in the air and sea under that pretext. The U.S. brought Japan into submission and tightened its grip on its military base in Okinawa in which it deployed Stealth fighters and latest war hardware while getting them ready to make sorties.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak bellicose group obsessed with pro-U.S. sycophancy and confrontation with fellow countrymen is driving the situation to the worst phase while blustering that "it would not rule out a war" at the instigation of the U.S. It is staging provocative "events for commemorating the 60th anniversary of the June 25 war", inciting extreme hostility towards the north and a war fever.
					
					 The appeal stressed the need for all the people to turn out in the sacred nationwide drive to smash the reckless moves of the south Korean and U.S. warmongers for a war against the DPRK and wage the active struggle in different parts of south Korea for the dismantlement of the U.S. forces bases.
					
					 It underscored the need to wage the strenuous struggle to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and ensure durable peace of the Korean Peninsula, and conduct the courageous struggle to put an end to the U.S. military occupation and colonial rule under the uplifted banner of independence against the U.S.
					
					 The people should probe into the truth behind the case of warship sinking, a hideous conspiratorial farce, and mete out stern punishment to the reckless Lee Myung Bak group of warmongers in the name of all the people, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 Soldiers of the south Korean army should not become cheap cannon fodder of the U.S. imperialists but turn their rifles to the group of traitors.
					
					 All the people should fully support and defend the Songun politics of the DPRK and avert a war, defend peace and hasten reunification of the country holing high the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: US Plan to Use Nukes against DPRK Disclosed
articles.content:
US Plan to Use Nukes against DPRK Disclosed
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the U.S. imperialists worked out a reckless plan to attack the DPRK with nukes at the time when the case of "EC-121" large spy plane occurred in 1969, according to south Korean KBS.
					 This fact was made known when a document which had been worked out by the U.S. Department of Defense at that time and presented by it to the White House on June 25, 1969 was opened to the public recently.
					
					 This emergency plan for attacking with nuclear weapons contained three proposals: the first one for attacking 12 places including airfields and naval bases with 0.2-10kt nukes, the second one for destroying 16 airfields with 70kt nukes and the third one to disable the bulk of the military muscle of the DPRK with 10-70kt nukes. 
					
					 The plan specifically envisaged the damage the U.S. imperialists may suffer when using nukes.
					
					 Their plan to use nukes against the DPRK had already been disclosed several times but it is the first time that this offensive plan which mentioned in detail targets for attack and even the damage to be suffered by them was opened to the public as if it were an operational plan, the report said.

articles.title: S. Korea's Suppression of Civic Organization under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Suppression of Civic Organization under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations and other civic and public organizations of south Korea at a press conference held in Seoul on June 23 condemned the puppet prosecution for suppressing the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society.
					 The organizations accused the puppet prosecution of conducting an investigation into the solidarity, branding its sending a letter demanding a fair and objective discussion on the "Cheonan" case to the UNSC as an "enemy-benefiting act" and the like.
					
					 It was just for the solidarity to have clarified its view before the UN, representing the people's mindset, the organizations said, adding that the authorities' suppression was entirely undemocratic violence encroaching upon the freedom of expression.
					
					 The organizations demanded the authorities stop at once the suppression of the solidarity and guarantee the people the freedom of expression so that they may properly probe the truth about the case.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Groups' Confrontation with DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Groups' Confrontation with DPRK Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Probing the Truth about "Cheonan" Case and Achieving Peace on the Korean Peninsula of south Korea released a statement on June 22 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for more zealously participating in the U.S.-led PSI.
					 The statement accused the authorities of recently contemplating staging maritime intercepting and inspection maneuvers, while pushing forward the proposal for partaking of OEG, a core organization of PSI, as a follow-up measure to cope with the case of the warship sinking.
					
					 Such acts perpetrated by the authorities against the backdrop of extremely escalating tensions between the south and the north are little short of declaring they would not rule out military conflicts, the statement said, expressing concern that this would only render the situation on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity tenser.
					
					 If the Lee Myung Bak "government" persistently sticks to its dangerous policy of blockade towards the DPRK which may bring the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse, it will stand further isolated from the international community, it noted.
					
					 If the authorities foster military conflicts to the last, concealing and falsifying the truth about the said case, they will not be able to escape a stern judgment of history and the people, it warned.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Groups' Suppression of Labor Movement Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Groups' Suppression of Labor Movement Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in Seoul on June 23 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its unpopular rule and suppression of the labor movement.
					 The rally was held in a terror-ridden atmosphere with at least 10,000 riot policemen of 100 companies laying a siege to the venue.
					
					 Speakers at the rally accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of deciding to put into force evil laws including the "Law on Trade Unions" aimed at stamping out the labor movement.
					
					  Such action of the authorities is little short of abusing the rights of not only workers but all other people and reveals their intention to totally stamp out the trade unions standing in the way of realizing their unpopular and anti-reunification policies, they noted, declaring that they would intensify the struggle to punish the Lee Myung Bak regime without fail.
					
					 At the end of the rally its participants staged a demonstration to hand a written protest to "Chongwadae".

articles.title: Brisk Solidarity Activities for Korean Schools in Japan
articles.content:
Brisk Solidarity Activities for Korean Schools in Japan
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Japan and members of Japanese civic organizations have staged solidarity actions in demand of the solution to the issue of supporting Korean schools in Japan.
					 A meeting for urging the Japanese authorities to include the Korean schools in the tuition-free program for high schools was held at the hall of members of Japan's House of Representatives on June 15.
					
					 Attending it were those concerned of the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan and Korean schools, students of Korean senior high schools in Tokyo and Kanagawa and members of the Society for Supporting Korean Schools in Kanagawa, the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange and other civic organizations of Japan and lawmakers.
					
					 At the meeting speakers recalled that the UN Commission on the Rights of Child recommended the Japanese government to settle the issue of supporting Korean schools through its examination into how the Treaty on the Rights of Child is abided by in Japan on May 27 and 28.
					
					 This is the result of the positive efforts made by Koreans of different standings for national education and children, they noted.
					
					 They stressed that Koreans in Japan would continue to conduct the brisk action of giving publicity to the validity of national education and the necessity for including Korean schools in the tuition-free program in widespread solidarity with civic organizations of Japan.
					
					 Information services and signature campaigns demanding the application of the tuition-free program to Korean schools on an equal footing have been staged nonstop in Hiroshima, Yokohama, Oyama, Tsuruhashi of Osaka and Tenno region and other parts of Japan with involvement of students of Korean schools and their parents and Korean youths in the main.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and book exhibitions were held in Denmark, Norway, Pakistan, South Africa and India from June 16 to 18 to commemorate the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Exhibited in the venues were his works and photos on his undying feats and books introducing the Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The chairman of the National Leadership of the Danish Communist Party said at the meeting that
						 Kim Jong Il has firmly defended Korean-style socialism, holding higher the banner of Songun towards the close of the last century.
					
					 He said he was of confident that the Korean people would smash the ceaseless anti-DPRK smear campaign of the imperialists and surely win a victory in their struggle to build a socialist thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway declared at the meeting that he would raise his voices strongly denouncing the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the imperialists and supporting the struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies stressed at the meeting that it is entirely thanks to the great leader that the WPK has firmly preserved its character and tradition along with the august name of its founder and given fuller play to its might. 
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Night of Pyongyang."
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Denmark, Norway and Pakistan.

articles.title: Anniversary of Joint Declaration Observed in Malta
articles.content:
Anniversary of Joint Declaration Observed in Malta
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Malta-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on June 14 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement noted that the adoption of the declaration the keynote of which is the idea of "By our nation itself" thanks to the great and courageous decision of General Secretary Kim Jong Il ushered in a new era of the independent reunification on the Korean Peninsula and the publication of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, made the prospect for the reunification of Korea brighter.
					
					 The inter-Korean joint declarations are the most just programmes for reunification common to the nation for improving the inter-Korean relations which had been strained due to the moves of the domestic and foreign separatist forces and bringing about a landmark phase in the reunification of Korea, it said.
					
					 It strongly demanded the south Korean authorities halt at once all acts running counter to the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and opt for national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Disseminated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Disseminated
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- An explanation meeting, a seminar and a reading session on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" were held in Italy, Switzerland and Uganda on June 18 and 19 to commemorate the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Flavio Pettinari, chief of the Fermo Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea of Italy, said at the meeting that the work is an important guideline to be held fast to by not only the Korean people but also all the parties and peoples aspiring after independence.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said at the seminar that the work comprehensively clarifies the essence, the basic task, principles and ways of ideological work in socialist society. The Korean people strong in ideology and faith rallied as one in mind around Kim Jong Il are registering signal successes in defending socialism and building a thriving nation while smashing the enemies' every move to stifle the DPRK, he noted.
					
					 Justin Keyune, chief of the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics of Kampala Kololo Higher Middle School of Uganda, at the reading session praised Kim Jong Il's exploits performed in leading the Party.

articles.title: Convocatoria de conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Convocatoria de conferencia del PTC
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publico el dia 23 la siguiente resolucion sobre la convocatoria de la conferencia del PTC:
					Hoy en dia, muy orgullosos de tener al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el puesto cimero de nuestro partido y revolucion, todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes, llenos de fe y optimismo de la victoria, libran dinamicamente la ofensiva general para hacer de este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido el de grandes cambios digno de registrarse en letras mayusculas en la historia de nuestra patria.
					
					  Durante el largo periodo de mas de 60 anos desde su fundacion, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, fundado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y guiado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, condujo a la victoria la revolucion coreana en las sagradas decadas de este proceso revolucionario y construyo asi sobre el territorio patrio una potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y de autodefensa dando inicio a la nueva era de prosperidad.
					
					  Hoy, se nos presenta la sagrada tarea revolucionaria de convertir a nuestra patria en la gran potencia prospera socialista al fortalecer el PTC, organizador y orientador de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano, como eterno partido glorioso del Presidente Kim Il Sung y al elevar su funcion y papel combativos.
					
					  En reflejo de la nueva demanda de nuestro partido y revolucion en desarrollo en que se produce un cambio decisivo en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista, el Buro Politico del CC del PTC resuelve convocar en la primera quincena de septiembre del 99 (2010) de la Era Juche la conferencia del PTC para elegir su maximo organo directivo.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia el "proyecto de resolucion para condenar al Norte"
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia el "proyecto de resolucion para condenar al Norte"
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- Hace poco, los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional" del Sur de Corea hicieron aprobar apresuradamente sin votacion en el "Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Asamblea Nacional" el "proyecto de resolucion para condenar al Norte" relativo al incidente del hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan".
					En ese proyecto los compinches del "GPN" volvieron a acusar perversamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando de la "provocacion", "disculpa", "castigo" y "recompensacion" y "urgieron" que las autoridades tomen las "contramedidas fuertes incluso los medios militares y desmilitares" y que la sociedad internacional tome las "contramedidas resueltas y eficientes". 
					
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria en su informacion no. 958, publicada el dia 26, senalo que esto es el flagrante desafio a la aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional e imperdonable acto antinacional que mostro el peligroso intento de desatar la guerra enfrentandose hasta el fin con la RPDC.
					
					Ahora, en el Sur de Corea y en la sociedad internacional va aumentando la sospecha del "resultado de investigacion" sobre el incidente del "Cheonan" publicado por la banda titere y se presenta el problema de reinvestigacion, e incluso en la ONU se deja en la incertidumbre la discusion sobre el particular, senala la nota y continua:
					
					La aprobacion del reciente documento por los compinches del "GPN" no pasa de ser ultimos esfuerzos de los que estan atemorizados ante la revelacion de los verdaderos aspectos del caso del "Cheonan".
					
					Si la banda titere recurre a la campana contra la RPDC bajo el pretexto del incidente del "Cheonan", se agravara solo la crisis de enfrentamiento y se aumentara el peligro de guerra.
					
					La RPDC no perdonara jamas la aprobacion forzada del "proyecto de resolucion" relacionado con el caso del "Cheonan". La camarilla titere asumira la entera responsabilidad de la situacion extremada en que se encuentre la Peninsula Coreana por el intento de llevar el "proyecto de resolucion de denuncia al Norte" a la sesion principal de la "Asamblea Nacional".

articles.title: Pyongyang: reunion internacional de jovenes y estudiantes
articles.content:
Pyongyang: reunion internacional de jovenes y estudiantes
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y del 60o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana desatada por el imperialismo yanqui, tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion internacional de jovenes y estudiantes en apoyo a la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					En la reunion participaron el presidente de la Federacion Mundial de la Juventud Democratica (FMJD), Diago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira y su comitiva, las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de jovenes y estudiantes de Cuba, Grecia, Namibia, Sudafrica, Nepal, Alemania, Laos, el Libano, Siria, Sri Lanka, Senegal, la India, Jordania, Espana, Vietnam, Palestina, Chipre, Portugal, etc., los delegados de la Organizacion Continental Latinoamericana de Estudiantes y la Union General de Estudiantes Arabes, los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises acreditados en Corea y los integrantes de la delegacion de la Union de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en Japon.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Choe Thae Bok, el primer secretario Ri Yong Chol y otros funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, funcionarios correspondientes, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					En su discurso de felicitacion Choe Thae Bok senalo que la presente reunion internacional constituye un gran estimulo a la lucha del pueblo y la juventud de Corea quienes aceleran con vigor la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Subrayo que en pleno acato a esta direccion el pueblo y la juventud de Corea cumpliran con su responsabilidad y papel en la lucha por defender con firmeza la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion y lograr la reunificacion y la prosperidad de la patria y lucharan energicamente por realizar la causa independiente de la humanidad uniendose solidamente con los pueblos progresistas, los jovenes y estudiantes del mundo.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que la reunion servira de un motivo significativo para suscitar la opinion publica internacional contra la imprudente campana de enfrentamiento y las maquinaciones de provocacion de guerra de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites tendentes a perjudicar la soberania de la RPDC y el derecho del pueblo coreano.
					
					En el informe de base, Diago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira se refirio al lado del pueblo coreano por defender la soberania del pais y realizar la reunificacion pacifica y anadio que los jovenes progresistas del mundo valoran altamente a la RPDC que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il vino desarrollando una energica lucha por abrir la puerta de la reunificacion a lo largo de decenas de anos.
					
					Puso al desnudo que el reciente incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" en el Mar Oeste de Corea es una farsa inventada por EE.UU. para agudizar la tension entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					En su informe suplementario Ri Yong Chol senalo que la realidad de la Peninsula Coreana revela por completo la naturaleza de EE.UU., destructor de la paz y la seguridad del mundo y caudillo de la agresion.
					
					Destaco que gracias a la original politica de Songun del Dirigente, se frustran sin piedad las incesantes maquinaciones de provocacion de nueva guerra de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos y se defienden confiablemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los progresistas jovenes, estudiantes y pueblos del mundo enviaran en el futuro tambien el activo apoyo y la solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo y la juventud de Corea por abrir nueva fase de la reunificacion independiente enarbolando la bandera del Songun.
					
					En el foro hicieron uso de la palabra los delegados de las regiones de Asia, Africa, Europa, America del Norte y del Medio Oriente.
					
					Y se dio lectura a la carta que le dirigieran al Dirigente Kim Jong Il las delegaciones y los delegados de las organizaciones de jovenes y estudiantes de varios paises y regiones del mundo participantes en la reunion internacional de los jovenes y estudiantes y la marcha de solidaridad que apoyan la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					
					Tambien fue aprobado el llamamiento dirigido a los gobiernos, los partidos politicos y las organizaciones de todos los paises del mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun destaca caracter agresivo de la guerra coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun destaca caracter agresivo de la guerra coreana
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- La pasada guerra coreana fue la agresiva desatada por el imperialismo yanqui instigando a los titeres surcoreanos para dominar toda la Peninsula Coreana y esclavizar al pueblo coreano.
					Hay muchos datos reveladores de que EE.UU. conocia bien la importancia geopolitica de la Peninsula Coreana como punto estrategico para el avance al continente asiatico y vino extendiendo desde hace mas de cien anos sus garras de agresion a esa region.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					Finalizada la Segunda Guerra Mundial en 1945, el imperio envio al Sur de Corea sus tropas agresoras disfrazadas de "liberadoras" bajo el pretexto de "desarmar" al ejercito japones. Desde el primer dia de su ocupacion del Sur de Corea, los belicistas norteamericanos convirtieron esta parte de la Peninsula Coreana en su colonia en sentido politico, economico y militar fabricando el gobierno titere proyanqui. Por otra parte, expuso abiertamente su intencion de invadir a la RPDC diciendo que "hay que ampliar a toda Corea la esfera de ocupacion".
					
					En el circulo politico de EE.UU. flotaron abiertamente las opiniones belicosas de que "Corea es el escenario de combate donde se decide el exito o el fracaso de EE.UU. en Asia".
					
					Despues de ocupar militarmente el Sur de Corea, EE.UU. promovio en etapa crucial la campana para desatar la guerra anti-RPDC en virtud de su agresiva politica del particular.
					
					A base de los preparativos minuciosos, EE.UU. desato por fin el 25 de junio de 1950 la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					En estos tiempos, con motivo del 60o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana, EE.UU. y la banda de conservadores surcoreanos actuan para provocar la nueva guerra tergiversando la verdad de lo ocurrido realmente en cuanto al desencadenamiento de esa contienda. Pero, esto es una locura que les adelantara la autodestruccion.
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos no pueden ocultar por nada la verdad de la historia ni eludir la responsabilidad de haber cometido ese crimen supergrande de haber desatado la guerra coreana mas devastadora y barbara.
